Text: Atik Mustafa Pasha Mosque (Turkish: "Atik Mustafa Paşa Camii" ; also named "Hazreti Cabir Camii") is a former Eastern Orthodox church in Istanbul, converted into a mosque by the Ottomans.
Triplets:<Atik Mustafa Pasha Mosque
4:
--------------------
Text: Atik Mustafa Pasha Mosque:  The building belongs stylistically to the eleventh-twelfth century.
Triplets:<Atik Mustafa Pasha Mosque
